descriptionHTML:
Set location based alarms for Railway Stations. The app comes with a list of Railway Stations with their locations to set the alarms. More stations are being continuously updated. You can even add stations of your own after downloading the app!

*** Featured in Google Play Store India Independence Day Collection, 2015 ***


Be informed when your train is about to reach your station, using the location services on your Android mobile phone!

An active internet connection and cellular network range will improve alarm reliability, and the performance will be better if location services is set to high accuracy in the phone settings.

The alarms may be set with a triggering radius of 5, 10, 15 or 25km, with an error margin of approximately 1 km.

There is also an alarm map, where the current distance to the alarm station can be checked.

The app uses a unique low battery consuming location alarm service provided by Anagog Ltd. (www.anagog.com)


The following countries are currently supported:
India
Israel
United Kingdom

Explanation of permissions asked:

- In-app purchase & Device ID: for an optional in-app purchase to remove ads from the app.

- Photos/media/files is the new name for SD Card permission: for backing up custom locations

- Phone state/Call Info: for waking up the phone if it is in stand-by when the alarm has to ring!
comments: Unable to find Coimbatore in the search page tried Railway name CBE as well no use. Please fix it then I can five 5 stars and downloading station information is useless you can fetch at any time you want.

poor user interface, and contains very annoying add with very loud sound that makes an alarm app which should make sounds at appropriate times almost useless, in app purchase poor value and no support. If I could have refunded I would have done within minutes of buying it but no refunds on this app.
